title: Eternum Rek’Sai ravages a new world

replies.body: I think this is the best skin in comparison with the classic skins of most of the new champions released.

OMG
WHAT IF THEY MADE A REN-GNAR SKIN FOR GNAR. LITTLE GNAR IS A KITTEN, AND MEGA IS RENGAR
POST THAT TO EVERY SINGLE RITO POST SO THAT IT MIGHT HAPPEN
AND NEXT TO REN-GNAR, WE NEED KHA-GNAR TO MAKE LEAGUE MORE BALANCED (ignore the fact that releasing two skins for a champion at the same time is not exactly balancing anything)

Would this have gnar become kha'zix when in mega gnar form, and a cockroach in mini gnar?

I'm worried the cockroach may get stepped on :/
maybe it could be like a mini khazix and then in mega gnar he could be giant, but then once he turns lvl 6 he gets red. cuz ya know. evolving
OMG OMG OMG MAKE A THREAD YES
logged in to upvote.
Dino gnar defiantly beats eternum {{champion:421}}
Dino Gnar's big Gnar animation made me want to buy it right away.

Dear Rito,
you should actually make an addition to these comment bars. Champion skins! useful in these situations.
Eternum Rek'Sai looks cooler, but Dino Gnar is still good.
What do you guys think about a Melee champion with a Q sort of like Jinx? It switches between Heavy Damage (2 handed weapon) and Attack Speed (Katana). Thought this would be a cool champion concept!

I had an idea like this a while ago, but didn't post anything since I thought the 'form switch' thing was being a bit over used as of late. Basically though it was a sentinel made from stone, and look kinda like a knight made out of rock who was covered in blue runes. With each ability basic ability used he would forcibly swap between a tankier, hard hitting version of himself, and a faster, quicker striking version. When using a spell in tanky form the effects would be shorter in range, have less damage but be heavy aoe while a fighter form spell would often be longer range and more precise, dealing more damage.
Um... did you already forget about {{champion:150}} ?

I know the similarity is already there but 'a while ago' was actually before Gnar's release. I know as a whole the idea sounds kinda similar but their both strictly melee and the transform is controlled. The idea was to create some interesting set ups for combinations or push certain costs like using a tanky aoe ability to push a wave in order to let you poke or trade with a more precise ability. It was all fuzzy concepts though, and Gnar's release actually gave me a really perfect champion for me to play. I love the little fuzz ball :)
I have one word for this. {{champion:77}}
jayce ult
Aatrox says hello? Very similar concept.
But... a katana ***is*** a two-handed weapon!
Tell that to {{champion:157}}
Isn't that kinda {{champion:126}} ?
like Deadpool? It would be cool.

Maybe a cool concept, but that would be on a melee carry.{{champion:114}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:157}} are melee carries, and the trend is, they are so difficult to balance since they either wreck or get wrecked every game.
that would be an amazing champion
So pretty much {{champion:126}}  ult
Could we get a new jinx skin first???
Spicy.
I like the little animation on the side there.
I've been wondering for a while now but why is her sprint animation her tongue flying out? I don't dislike it, just wondering what lead to that decision.
rito plz make gentlewomen Rek'sai for april fools and have it be like gentlemen cho'goth

Am i the only one who IS DYING FOR A ETERNUM VEL'KOZ SKIN? That would be the best thing ever!He doesn't have a skin i really like (i personally did not like battle cast vel'koz) It would be amazing to have eternum vel'koz in my opinion.{{champion:161}}

plus in my opinion the skins dont really affect the lore , like what carnage said rek'sai has a eternum skin now does that really mean he is a nocturne like creature? in my opinion not really... its just a skin to me

 TheUnknownError  - about an hour ago




REK'SAI IS A SHE DAMNIT!!!!!!!

If they did that, that would kinda clear up the whole idea of where did nocturne originate from... It would basically ruin his entire lore, by making it obvious he is from the void. Currently he has no known origin.

Aside from ruining nocturne's lore, seems like a decent idea though.
Nocturne  is a nightmare who got stuck in a champion in league, nightmares don't need an origin, but he's definatly not from the void
Rek'Sai has an eternum skin now, so isn't Nocturne's lore already ruined?
yeah but ... he would look pretty sweet
Possibly. However, putting a second void champion with the skin would make it completely ruined, because as is it could just be passed off as coincidence
You Misspelled "Flying Spaghetti Vel'koz"

There is no face...
Edit: Well i just looked at her base skin, and i guess that doesn't have a face either.

An Ice Rek'Sai skin would be worth my money!
Or even a Jurassic skin!
im telling u rek sai is a support
I've Seen Rek'sai go AP support. The enemy botlane just couldn't handle it.
Again 3D Models and like so hardcore amazing

Skin is cool, but it makes Rek'Sai look too small. I honestly would've wanted Deep Terror Rek'Sai, but this one appeals to the other type of audience i guess.
